Attributes.description: Current research topics in pure and applied mathematics are explored at the undergraduate level. Technical communication and research skills are developed.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of MATH 220, MATH 226. (and 6 credits of MATH courses numbered 300 or higher.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:00, Building: Leonard, Room: S.
